00019 #include "CalvinCelFileWriter.h"
00020 #include "CELData.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 CelFileWriter::CelFileWriter(CelFileData &p) 
00025 {
00026         p.SetVersion(CurrentCelFileVersion);
00027         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00028         intensityPos = 0;
00029         stdDevPos = 0;
00030         pixelPos = 0;
00031         outlierPos = 0;
00032         maskPos = 0;
00033         WriteHeaders();
00034 }
00035 
00036 CelFileWriter::~CelFileWriter() 
00037 {
00038         delete writer;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void CelFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00042 {
00043         writer->WriteHeader();
00044         DataGroupWriter* dataGroupWriter = &writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00045         dataGroupWriter->WriteHeader();
00046 
00047         DataSetWriterIt begin;
00048         DataSetWriterIt end;
00049         dataGroupWriter->GetDataSetWriters(begin, end);
00050         while(begin != end)
00051         {
00052                 dataSetWriter = &(*begin);
00053                 begin->WriteHeader();
00054                 SetFilePositions();
00055                 begin++;
00056         }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void CelFileWriter::WriteIntensities(const FloatVector& v)
00060 {
00061         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(intensityPos);
00062         FloatVectorConstIt begin = v.begin();
00063         FloatVectorConstIt end = v.end();
00064         while(begin != end)
00065         {
00066                 dataSetWriter->Write(*begin);
00067                 begin++;
00068         }
00069         intensityPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CelFileWriter::WriteStdDevs(const FloatVector& v)
00073 {
00074         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(stdDevPos);
00075         FloatVectorConstIt begin = v.begin();
00076         FloatVectorConstIt end = v.end();
00077         while(begin != end)
00078         {
00079                 dataSetWriter->Write(*begin);
00080                 begin++;
00081         }
00082         stdDevPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00083 }
00084 
00085 void CelFileWriter::WritePixels(const Int16Vector &v)
00086 {
00087         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pixelPos);
00088         Int16VectorConstIt begin = v.begin();
00089         Int16VectorConstIt end = v.end();
00090         while(begin != end)
00091         {
00092                 dataSetWriter->Write(*begin);
00093                 begin++;
00094         }
00095         pixelPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00096 }
00097 
00098 void CelFileWriter::WriteOutlierCoords(const XYCoordVector &v)
00099 {
00100         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(outlierPos);
00101         XYCoordConstIt begin = v.begin();
00102         XYCoordConstIt end = v.end();
00103         while(begin != end)
00104         {
00105                 dataSetWriter->Write(begin->xCoord);
00106                 dataSetWriter->Write(begin->yCoord);
00107                 begin++;
00108         }
00109         outlierPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00110 }
00111 
00112 void CelFileWriter::WriteMaskCoords(const XYCoordVector &v)
00113 {
00114         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(maskPos);
00115         XYCoordConstIt begin = v.begin();
00116         XYCoordConstIt end = v.end();
00117         while(begin != end)
00118         {
00119                 dataSetWriter->Write(begin->xCoord);
00120                 dataSetWriter->Write(begin->yCoord);
00121                 begin++;
00122         }
00123         maskPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00124 }
00125 
00126 void CelFileWriter::SetFilePositions()
00127 {
00128         const std::wstring &name = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetName();
00129         int32_t dataSetSz = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetSize();
00130         
00131         if(name == CelIntensityLabel)
00132         {
00133                 intensityPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00134                 intensityLimitPos = intensityPos + dataSetSz;
00135         }
00136         else if(name == CelStdDevLabel)
00137         {
00138                 stdDevPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00139                 stdDevLimitPos = stdDevPos + dataSetSz;
00140         }
00141         else if(name == CelPixelLabel)
00142         {
00143                 pixelPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00144                 pixelLimitPos = pixelPos + dataSetSz;
00145         }
00146         else if(name == CelOutlierLabel)
00147         {
00148                 outlierPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00149                 outlierLimitPos = outlierPos + dataSetSz;
00150         }
00151         else
00152         {
00153                 maskPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00154                 maskLimitPos = maskPos + dataSetSz;
00155         }
00156 
00157         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00158         dataSetWriter->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00159 }
